name.baseName: Bioethanol ; Liquid hot water ; Collection and transportation
生物乙醇 ; 水热法处理 ; 收集与运输

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The described industrial process involves the production of bioethanol, which is to be collected and transported using liquid hot water pretreatment technology. This bioethanol can be utilized as a renewable fuel source primarily for automotive applications, as a substitute for gasoline. The specific use case is the combustion of bioethanol in cars to lower carbon emissions.
所述工业过程涉及使用液态热水预处理技术生产生物乙醇，该生物乙醇可作为可再生燃料来源，主要用于汽车应用，代替汽油。具体使用案例是在汽车中燃烧生物乙醇以降低碳排放。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Through data quality evaluation, 141 datasets with high completeness and consistency were selected from the reported 561 datasets in 474 published papers and classified into eight technological configurations determined by the pretreatment technology. The technological steps following pretreatment were all the same, although actual flows and parameter values vary, as observed in the literature
通过数据质量评估，从474篇已发表论文的561个数据集中选择了141个具有高完整性和一致性的数据集，并将其分类为由预处理技术确定的8种技术配置。预处理后的技术步骤都是相同的，尽管实际流量和参数值在文献中观察到不同
technology.technologicalApplicability: The described industrial process involves the production of bioethanol, which is to be collected and transported using liquid hot water pretreatment technology. This bioethanol can be utilized as a renewable fuel source primarily for automotive applications, as a substitute for gasoline. The specific use case is the combustion of bioethanol in cars to lower carbon emissions.
所述工业过程涉及使用液态热水预处理技术生产生物乙醇，该生物乙醇可作为可再生燃料来源，主要用于汽车应用，代替汽油。具体使用案例是在汽车中燃烧生物乙醇以降低碳排放。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Global datasets were used where possible, since the study does not apply to any specific region. LCI data for one external process named “Combustion of bioethanol in car” were obtained from the GREET database
在可能的情况下使用了全球数据集，因为该研究不适用于任何特定地区。一种名为“汽车中生物乙醇燃烧”的外部过程的LCI数据来自GREET数据库
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: We assessed the robustness of the modeling results through uncertainty propagation (Monte Carlo), discernibility analysis, global sensitivity analysis, and scenario variation.
我们通过不确定性传播（蒙特卡罗）、可辨别性分析、全局敏感性分析和场景变化评估了建模结果的鲁棒性。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: The given LCA datasets are highly specific to the production and utilization of bioethanol with liquid hot water pretreatment and are classified into eight technological configurations for proper comparison. Users should apply global datasets when regional specificity is not required. Special attention should be paid to the methodological advice, such as the inclusion of the combustion of bioethanol in cars sourced from the GREET database for analyzing emissions. Furthermore, users are encouraged to consider the provided robustness assessments such as Monte Carlo simulations, discernibility analysis, global sensitivity analysis, and scenario variations to understand the uncertainties and sensitivities associated with the data.
所提供的生命周期评估(LCA)数据集对于液态热水预处理生产和使用生物乙醇非常具体，并分为八种技术配置，以便进行适当比较。当区域特有性不是必需时，应用全球数据集。用户应特别注意方法论建议，比如包括来源于GREET数据库的汽车燃烧生物乙醇的分析，以研究排放。此外，鼓励用户考虑提供的稳健性评估，如蒙特卡洛模拟、可辨识性分析、全球敏感性分析和情景变化，以了解数据的不确定性和敏感性。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
